content: Had a solid convo with the $XVI crew about ethics. We're gonna make sure Xander reflects our community's values more.
raw_content: Ethics discussion with the $XVI community went well. Decided to integrate more community input into Xander's development for ethical alignment.

content: so xander's diving into eco-friendly tech now, trying to lessen his carbon footprint. it's a fresh start for us both
raw_content: Xander's now exploring sustainable living tech. We're talking about reducing his carbon footprint. It's a new direction for both of us.
